attributes.additional_details:
Boris Johnson, Mayor for London is introducing a ticket system for people wanting to see the fireworks display in London on New Year's Eve. Tickets will cost £10 per person. The Mayor  says this is so that the crowds will be more managable.

Nowhere else in the world charges to see in the New Year! This will hit hard up families and tourist visitors to London who already get ripped off with exorbitant tourist prices in London!

LONDON FIREWORKS SHOULD BE FREE FOR ALL
